name: Upgrade Parkour
description:
Fly through the sky and explore handcrafted levels while upgrading your movement abilities along the way!  Tools include a shotgun for increased vertical mobility, sprinting for swift movement, a jetpack that allows you to leap great bounds, and a grappling hook to allow you to swing from any surface.  Accumulate tools as you progress and master this unique movement system!

3D models made using MagicaVoxel

Music made using Bosca Ceoil
